body.name: Charmast Portable Charger with Built-in Cables and AC Wall Plug, 10000mAh Compact Slim Power Bank, External Battery Pack, Travel Essentials Compatible with iPhone, Samsung, iPad, All Cellphones
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 22 hrs 38 mins
features: Seven in One: Built-in USB C & micro and other three cables integrated for all phones, additional 5V/3A USB C and USB A ports provide faster charging/recharging speed, LCD display shows the remaining juice visually, portable phone charger with wall plug allows you to travel not being tied by the bulky charger.
Power Your Whole Day: 10,000mAh battery capacity provides 1.6 charges for your iPhone 13, 1 charge for your Samsung S22 ultra which can keep your phone always on.
Slim Compact Design: The portable charger weighs about 8 ounces, the same as for the iPhone 13 Pro Max. 5.95" x 2.76" x 0.72" slim design fits comfortably in the palm or pocket.

Wake up, Ready go: Pass-through charging technology allows you to charge your phone and power bank at the same time. Wake up with a fully charged phone and battery pack. (The max output will be only 1A under this function)

What You Get: 90-Day full refund with any technical problem warranty, portable charger 10000mAh*1, mesh pouch*1, user manual*1, our worry-free 24-month warranty, and 7-day/24-h friendly customer service. If you have any problems, please contact us and we will solve them within 24 hrs.

How can I get the best solution if I have a problem with my product? You can find us on your manual or through your order. If there is any quality issue with your item within ONE YEAR after your purchase, we will send you a new one without hesitation. Can this be taken on a plane? Yes, it's only 38.5Wh which allows it to take on an airplane, but you need to take it on your carry-on bags. Carry-on bags: Yes Checked on bags: No How do you turn it off? Hitting the power button and it won’t turn off. When unplugging the phone, the display screen of the power bank will constantly light on for 35 seconds and then shut off. The power bank will shut off automatically after 2 seconds after you double-click the power button.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very handy charger
reviews.reviewText: I have many of these chargers. They are very nice to travel with. It fits perfectly in my travel bag or purse while we are on the go or at a ballpark. It stays charged and it is convenient that it works with iPhone and android.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My favorite portable charger!
reviews.reviewText: I purchased two of these a few months back after borrowing a friends and loved them so much I got each of my kids one for Christmas this year. I love that you don't have to keep up with a charging cable or a block, you can just plug it into a wall outlet to recharge and all of the output charging cords are attached (and everything tucks into the charger until you are ready to use them). It does take a little while for a full charge but I just plug it in overnight after use. There is an LED display that tells you what the capacity is on the charger (0-100). When it has a full charge two or three people can easily use it to charge up their devices. It's been perfect at all-day sporting events with the kids, no need to find an outlet and sit and wait. It's about the size of an iPhone so it's super portable. A great value for the price! And a side note - one of my original two got dropped and the corner got a little banged up so the wall plug doesn't always work now, and I can still charge it the "old" way using a cable, so even though it's not as convenient the charger itself still works.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent portable charger
reviews.reviewText: I’ve bought several of these types of chargers and purchased this one as a gift for my mom. She was raving about it to me earlier this week. She loves that it plugs directly into the wall to recharge, the convenience of not having to carry extra cords and how quickly it charges her devices. She has other portable chargers but reaches for this one the most because it is also light compared to what she already had. Highly recommend it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars seems like a great portable charger- and it has an iphone Lightening Plug cable
reviews.reviewText: I wanted to get a backup charger for my wife for her to take with her when she travels in case she can't get to an outlet or use a car charger. This one has pretty great capacity at 10,000 mah, and I like the fact it is self-contained, with a fold out charging plug for the unit and cables for the devices built right in. It works great with her iphone, and it does have the iphone lightening charger plug as one of the options. That didn't seem totally clear in the advertisement, because iphone has now gone to a USB charging port instead of the lightening proprietary plug, so was glad to see that feature here. You can use it as a pass-through charger, to charge your phone or other device while it is plugged in. Came initially charged at 78%, took about 2 1/2 hours plugged in to a wall outlet to reach 100%. I tried it on my phone, which is in an Otter Box Defender series, and the plug would not fit due to the case, so if you have one of the heavier phone cases because you drop your phone a lot, you might have to take it out of the case to charge it with this battery pack. Not too big of a problem. My wife has a lighter duty Otter Box Commuter Series case on her phone, and the plug reaches in and connects with no problem. If the battery lasts like they say it should, this will be a great backup. Should get at least 2, maybe three full charges out of it before needing to recharge the unit's battery pack.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great and Fast
reviews.reviewText: My daughter loves the charger compact and fast.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This charger was my best friend on my trip to Europe. Absolutely amazing. Only small downside is it takes a while to charge up but from there, you're golden.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This charger is great to keep in my purse to charge my phone or my kids devices. It has multiple plugs to adapt to whatever you need to charge. Being able to plug it straight into the wall to recharge it is so convenient!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have purchased one of these for each family member since I have used mine for the past 8 months and LOVE it! No more fumbling to find the right cord since all 3 are right there attached to the battery pack. I like the ones that plug into the wall so I can see the charge amount right on the power bank.I go to lots of retreats and this goes with me because It is handy, it works, and the battery life is incredible! When I set up for a show I don't worry about my phone running low when I carry this power bank. It is a lifesaver!So in a nutshell:Easy to useLarge display on front so you can see the charge amountAll 3 types of cordsLoooong battery lifePush button at the top allows you to see the display when it sleepsUSB slotIt is a large item and has some weight to it but I can find it in my show stuff easily!
Best portable charger for smart phone, it's fast and fully charged can charge my iPhone 12 3 times.

Au delà de mes espérances pour l'essai fait à la réception. Le chargeur était à 87 % plein, mon téléphone était à 27%.(Galaxy Samsung A51). En une heure ma batterie de téléphone était remontée à 90 % et le chargeur affichait 70%. Idéal en voyage pour faire un max de photo, le délai de 1h de recharge (le temps d'un repas au restau) est parfait pour repartir l'après-midi et faire autant de photos que le matin. Exactement ce que je voulais et même plus. Suis ravie ! Bon pour le poids...on ne peut pas tout avoir et l'essentiel est que je puisse remonter la batterie de mon téléphone très vite en voyage :)
Great if you are a power user with long days
